# Q7

```{r}
library(bio3d)

align <- read.fasta("seqdump.fasta")
seqid <- seqidentity(align)

# Increase the outer top margin to provide more space for the title
par(oma=c(0,0,3,0))

# Your heatmap code here
heatmap(log(seqid + 1) ^ (-1), cexRow = 1, cexCol = 1, margins = c(10, 10), scale = "none")

# Add the title with increased space
title(main = "My Heatmap Title", cex.main = 1, outer = TRUE)

```
